Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Midway
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Midway due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Midway due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
